name: Resideo Technologies, Inc.
description: Resideo Technologies, Inc. is a global leader in smart home solutions and security, providing innovative products that enhance the comfort, safety, and efficiency of homes and businesses. Established as a spin-off from Honeywell International Inc. in 2018, Resideo focuses on two key segments: Global Retail and Professional Solutions. The company offers a wide range of products, including smart thermostats, home sensors, security systems, and water leak detectors, designed to improve energy efficiency and enhance home security. Resideo's commitment to innovation is evident through its extensive portfolio of connected home technologies, which leverage the Internet of Things (IoT) to deliver seamless integration and control for homeowners. By prioritizing sustainability and energy conservation, Resideo not only provides valuable solutions for modern living but also contributes to a greener future. The company operates globally, serving customers through a robust distribution network and partnerships with leading retailers and contractors. With a mission to simplify the lives of its customers, Resideo continues to invest in advanced technologies and user-friendly designs that cater to the evolving needs of consumers in an increasingly connected world.
